welcome: It looks like this is the first time you've used Tango. Welcome!
welcome-2: There's just a few steps you'll need to complete before you can start playing.
nickname-step-description: You can change this at any time.
roms-step-description: Make sure they're pristine, unpatched ROMs.
roms-step-error: Found files, but could not find any supported ROMs. Please make sure they're unpatched!
saves-step-description: Make sure they're compatible with the games you've put in the ROMs folder. They should be .sav or .sa1 files.
saves-step-error: Found files, but could not find any supported saves. Please make sure they compatible.
